page.description: The <OBJECT>.SELECT_TEXT() method selects text in the current field from Start_Position for Length characters. If Length is -1, then the selection goes to the end of the field.

argument.name: start_position
argument.description: The position of the first character to select.

argument.name: length
argument.description: The number of characters to select. If Length is -1, then the selection goes to the end of the field.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.title: Example
section.description: Select text in a field Lastname in current form.
